alert.note: Alert for Southern Nassau; Southern Westchester; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 15 at 1:11PM EST until December 16 at 6:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 6 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 45 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield and Southern New Haven Counties. In New York, Southern Westchester, Southwest Suffolk and Southern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 6 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Southern Nassau; Southern Westchester; Southwest Suffolk
